entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a young boy who is being referred to as 'boy' by Uncle Vernon. (Excerpt: "It's you, boy, I know it.")

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is suspicious and accusatory towards Harry. (Excerpt: "It's you, boy, I know it.")

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Malevolent creatures that are described as being present in Little Whinging. (Excerpt: "I did the Patronus Charm to get rid of the dementors")

entities.name: patronus charm
entities.description: A magical spell that Harry uses to repel the dementors. (Excerpt: "I did the Patronus Charm to get rid of the dementors")

relationships.description: Harry uses the Patronus Charm to repel the dementors. (Excerpt: "I did the Patronus Charm to get rid of the dementors")
